ISSUE.TITLE: Search paging doesn't work
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.80.2 > If you go to the advanced search page and Search keyword:"gift", 4 come back. If you then change the "Display per page" from 6 to 3, it comes back with "No products were found that matched your criteria." > There are no errors in the System > Log. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/101773/page-search-error Probably related to #7308

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7506 PayPal Commerce plugin. Fix incorrect calculation of taxable shipping

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7520 fixed problem of 'Search paging doesn't work'
